ch.nolix.element._3DGUI

Interface IShapeRenderer<S extends Shape<S>,RO,SRO>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of the shape a shape renderer can render.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IJMonkeyShapeRenderer<S,RO>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JMonkeyCuboidRenderer, JMonkeyCylinderRenderer, JMonkeyMultiShapeRenderer, JMonkeySphereRenderer

    public interface IShapeRenderer<S extends Shape<S>,RO,SRO>
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void addSubRenderObject(RO renderObject, SRO subRenderObject)
      Lets this shape renderer add the given sub render object to the given render object.
      RO createRenderObject() 
      default void removeSubRenderObject(RO renderObject, SRO subRederObject)
      Lets this shape renderer remove the given sub render object from the given render object.
      void render(S shape, RO renderObject)
      Lets this shape renderer render the given shape.
